spec_data.Name: nodejs-ncp
spec_data.Description:
This module is an asynchronous recursive copy utility for Node.js.
Think cp -r, but pure node, and asynchronous. ncp can be used both
as a CLI tool and programmatically.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 03:32:39 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Asynchronous recursive file copy utility for Node.js
